LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_AverageDPS.label: melee damage per second
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_AverageDPS.description: Average damage dealt per second in melee combat, if all attacks hit.
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_DamageMultiplier.label: melee damage multiplier
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_DamageMultiplier.description: A damage multiplier applied to melee combat.
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_CooldownMultiplier.label: melee cooldown
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_CooldownMultiplier.descripti: A multiplier on attack delay for weapons made of this material.
LanguageData.SharpDamageMultiplier.label: sharp damage
LanguageData.SharpDamageMultiplier.description: A multiplier on damage from sharp-type attacks for weapons made of this material.
LanguageData.BluntDamageMultiplier.label: blunt damage
LanguageData.BluntDamageMultiplier.description: A multiplier on damage from blunt-type attacks for weapons made of this material.
